Articles.Content:
Trying to install KSRSS, and it is stuck on infinite loop. I added each dependency mod manually, and all loaded well until I reached Kopernicus, which causes it to get stuck.

I have installed all of Kopernicus's dependencies, and made sure that Kopernicus itself is the last version that was made with KSP version 1.10.1 in mind.

My KSP.log is here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MsEci2FFmxvLmpri8fgQCRcR8L9J8Ptm/view?usp=sharing

[Edit: I made the mistake of placing KSRSS folders into the KSRSS-reborn folder they came in. Moved them all directly into GameData, and it worked.]

Edited November 29, 2023 by TanoPrime
Issue solved
